gomo [options] <scoring file> <organism>
Options: --motif <id> (default=all) --verbosity [1|2|3|4] (default 2) --go-map [g2s|s2g] mapping of the go-term file: go-term to sequence (g2s) or opposite (default g2s) --o <output dir> name of the directory for output, will not replacing existing dir --oc <output dir> name of the directory for output, will replace existing dir --text FLAG output in text format only --nostatus FLAG prevent output of the progress report to the terminal
